Sentence: The next morning, Henry and Jean Louise's trip has made the rounds of the town gossip, which scandalizes Alexandra, but Jean Louise and Atticus are mildly amused
After church, Atticus and Henry leave for a political meeting
She (Louise) follows Atticus and Henry to their meeting, which turns out to be a gathering of the Maycomb County Citizen's Council, an organization promoting segregation and white supremacy
Henry comes up with a scheme to save the day, and it later turns out that Atticus had had the idea but had planted the seed of it in Henry's mind
As she (Louise) yells at Henry for being a hypocrite, she (Louise) realizes that Atticus is standing right there
